T02TD3661AE:265b-0: @265b // yang na sgrub thabs ras ris kyi cho ga las bsgom par 'dod na /
T02TD3661AE:265b-1: sngar shad pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD3661AE:265b-2: de bzhin du rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD3661AE:265b-3: de'i steng du yi ge mam zhes bya ba /
T02TD3661AE:265b-4: yi ge aa dang thig le dang ldan pa'i snying po'i mchog bsams la ;
T02TD3661AE:265b-5: de nas 'od zer sna tshogs pa spros pa las byung ba des /
T02TD3661AE:265b-6: bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar bsams la /
T02TD3661AE:265b-7: mchod pa lnga la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD3661AE:265b-8: chos bdag med par bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD3661AE:265b-9: aom sva bha wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD3661AE:266a-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de ltar @266a * //
T02TD3661AE:266a-1: lhag par mos par byas pas /
T02TD3661AE:266a-2: khams gsum pa 'di dag mig yor tsam du shes par byas la /
T02TD3661AE:266a-3: de'i sa bon las byung ba'i aa shva ka'i yal ga / de'i steng du yi ge mam de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun lha mo de'i skur bdag nyid bsam pa ni /
T02TD3661AE:266a-4: yum lha mo 'od zer can sku mdog 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar shin tu ser ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-5: sku'i 'od zer nyi ma ltar 'bar ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-6: spyi bor mchod rten gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-8: sku stod tshig gu can gyi zhing chung du bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-10: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-21: rgya skyegs kyi mdog 'dra ba 'phro ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-22: spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mnan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-23: aa shva ka'i phreng bas dbul brgyan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-24: phyag g-yas na rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang ;
T02TD3661AE:266a-27: mda' gsor ba la dgyes pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-29: gzhu dang aa shva ka'i yal ga dang /
T02TD3661AE:266a-33: gser sbyangs ba ltar shin tu ser ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-35: zhal gyi sgros li khri'i rdul gyis btsos pa 'dra ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-36: sgeg pa'i nyams kyis gnas par gyur pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-37: zhal g-yas pa padma r'a ga ltar shin tu dmar ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-39: zhal g-yon pa phag gi gdong 'phro ba dang bcas shing mi sdug pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-40: mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD3661AE:266a-42: nyi ma bcu gnyis dang 'od mnyam pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-43: smin ma bsdus shing khor gnyer dang ldan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-44: mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3661AE:266a-45: dbu la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog gser sbyangs pa ltar shin tu dag pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-46: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
T02TD3661AE:266a-47: ral pa dang thor tshugs mnga' bar bzhugs pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-48: gzhal yas khang mchod rten gyi dbyibs la shing aa shva ka'i me tog gis khyab pa'i nang na /
T02TD3661AE:266a-49: phag gi steng na g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD3661AE:266a-50: gzhon nu mdang la bab pa'i tshul can /
T02TD3661AE:266a-51: shing rta'i 'og na ha las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na /
T02TD3661AE:266b-0: gza' chen po sgra @266b gcan 'dzin nyin mo nyi ma 'dzin pa mtshan mo zla ba 'dzin gnas pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-1: lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor bar bag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-3: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li /
T02TD3661AE:266b-8: zhes bya bas lha mo sku mdog dmar ba zhal gcig pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-9: phag gi gdong pa can spyan gsum pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-10: phyag bzhi pa g-yas na khab dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-11: g-yon na gzhu dang aa shva ka'i yal ga bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-12: zhing chung du stod g-yogs dmar po bstan pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-13: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga yid la gang zhig sgrub par 'dod pa'i bud med 'gugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-15: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li /
T02TD3661AE:266b-21: mu kham bandha bandha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3661AE:266b-22: lha mo sngar bshad pa'i na bza' dang rgyan dang gzugs dang ldan mod kyi /
T02TD3661AE:266b-23: 'on kyang 'di ni sku mdog ser ba /
T02TD3661AE:266b-24: g-yas na aa shva ka'i yal ga dang khab bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-25: g-yon na zhags pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-26: gdug pa rnams kyi kha dang mig 'chem par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-28: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li /
T02TD3661AE:266b-33: stam bha ya bam sv'a h'a /
T02TD3661AE:266b-34: zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa sngar dang 'dra mod kyi /
T02TD3661AE:266b-35: 'on kyang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang khab g-yon na gzhu dang aa shva ka'i yal ga bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-36: sku mdog aindra n'i la lta bu gdug pa can thams cad rengs par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-43: sarba satva na me pa sha ma n'a ya ho:sv'a h'a /
T02TD3661AE:266b-44: zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa snga ma dang mthun mod kyi 'on kyang sku mdog nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba /
T02TD3661AE:266b-45: phyag g-yas na mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-46: g-yon gzhu dang aa shva ka'i yal ga bsnams pa /
T02TD3661AE:266b-47: sems can thams cad la rjes su chags par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-48: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD3661AE:266b-49: ye shes sems dpa' dang dam tshig gi lha gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-50: de nas bzlas brjod bya ba'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02TD3661AE:266b-51: aom m'a r'i tsyee aom m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3661AE:267a-1: bzlas la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD3661AE:267a-2: 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs byas pa las //
T02TD3661AE:267a-3: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags des //
T02TD3661AE:267a-4: sems can thams cad 'od zer can gyi ni //
T02TD3661AE:267a-5: ye shes dri med gnas thob shog / lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD3661AE:267a-6: lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
